reviewText: this VHS "how to lambada" is only approximately 15 minutes which is too short to teach lambada. there are no detailed instruction on how to dance the lambada. you will just be disappointed viewing this video if you really want to learn this dance. these same producers did a better job in making the "how to salsa - as seen from "salsa the movie".  i don't know why they did a very poor job in this supposedly instructional video. i guess there was really nothing to teach about this dance but to just gyrate your body and hips and act sexy.
